column2: we ended up here since the parking lot around Agora Cafe was crowded
column3: so me and my friends decided to go and check this place nearby. The place is nice
column4: but one thing we didn't like that much was that the selection of desserts was scarce - maybe the time we arrived was late for their standards (Saturday around 6:30 pm). Anyhow
column5: the place is nice to hang out with friends and chat
column6: so nice that they even let us stay even 30 minutes after they closed lol. I might come back earlier during the day so I get to check on all the rest of the things everyone mentions on their reviews :D
